mapper.select: SELECT t1.all_days, t2.real_days, (t1.all_days - t2.real_days) AS miss_days FROM( SELECT DATEDIFF( (SELECT NOW()), (SELECT write_date FROM tb_diary WHERE user_id = #{uid} AND status != -1 ORDER BY write_date LIMIT 0, 1) ) AS all_days ) AS t1 INNER JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(write_date)) AS real_days FROM tb_diary WHERE user_id = #{uid} AND status != -1 ) AS t2
